content: the hourglass mens scarf is a crochet pattern made in two colors in a fun stitch pattern that maintains interest whether you re a beginner or experienced it makes a great gift for men or women >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //makeitcrochet com/hourglass-mens-scarf-free-crochet-pattern/
